sentences.sContent: Their clients are drawn from the highest echelons of society.
sentences.sCn: 他们的客户是从社会最高层吸引来的。

synos.tran: 梯形；梯次编队；梯阵；阶层

phrases.pCn: 排成梯队的(地)；梯次配置的(地)

trans.tranCn: [军]梯形, 梯阵, 梯次编队
trans.tranOther: a rank or level of authority in an organization, business etc, or the people at that level
